thread.title: Gap Is Replacing CEO of Flagship Brand

author: Khadeeja Safdar
title: Gap Is Replacing CEO of Flagship Brand
text:
Gap Inc. is searching for a new leader of its flagship brand as it looks to jump-start sales.
The apparel retailer said Tuesday that Jeff Kirwan has resigned after three years as Gap brand president and chief executive. Brent Hyder, Gap executive vice president of global talent and sustainability, will serve as interim brand president.
